page.title: 03FAMILY LIFE
page.content:
There are very few persons now resident in the Lea Parish that were actually born in the parish itself.
There has been quite considerable movement across the 7 parishes due to either wanting to be close to the main source of employment: Rank Xerox at Mitcheldean, Listers at Cinderford, Dowty near Gloucester, Northern Colliery near Cinderford or conversely not wanting to be close to the site of employment and sought the peaceful retreat of the rural areas.
Many of the old cottages and barns have been renovated either for the use of local inhabitants or for usage as holiday homes by distant owners or hired on a weekly or monthly basis.
